title.rendered: Career Opportunity of Digital Marketing in Chennai

content.rendered:
[vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column][vc_column_text]Being located on the Coromandel Coast of the Bay of Bengal, the city Chennai is among one of the largest cultural, economic and educational centres in South India with many small-medium enterprises offering numerous of job opportunities for the young professionals, undergraduates, graduates, working Professionals, Freelancers, Housewives and Entrepreneurs.  As the city contains both international and domestic companies, it has become an IT hub/destination implanted by various services like software, medical, tourism, hardware manufacturing & financial services, electronics and pharmaceuticals. So, if you are someone looking for various career opportunity & struggling to get a well-established career in Chennai, then it is the right time for you to upgrade yourself with skills that are most in-demand skills with high career growth, salary package, job security and reputation with many career options available in the industry to grow exponentially. Thus, to kick-start or advance your career in Chennai, it will be beneficial for you to get training in Digital Marketing Domain from one of the best digital marketing course in Chennai. The best part about enhancing yourself with digital marketing skills is that you need not have to worry about the background you belong to. Even if you are a lawyer, student, engineer, counsellor etc. you can easily grab an opportunity to make a career in the domain of digital marketing. In this article, I will take you through the best career opportunities in the field of Digital Marketing.

Career Opportunity of Digital Marketing in Chennai

SEO Analyst/SEO Specialist In order to grab the opportunity to work as an SEO Analyst / SEO Specialist in Chennai, you need to have a strong understanding of the module SEO, where you can work on the various SEO strategies to rank the website in the Search Engine Resulting Page i.e (SERP’s), understand the various search engine like Google, Bing and yahoo, continuously upgrade yourself with the Search Engine algorithm to stay ahead of the competition and other businesses within the industry. The average salary of the SEO’s with an experience of 1 – 2 years ranges approx Rs. 2,20,000 in India. Social Media Expert/Specialist With the increase in the number of social media users, by 2023 social media users are expected to reach around 3.43 billion monthly active users and approximately 450 million from India.  As users on social media are increasing day by day, the companies or a brand in Chennai are looking for the social media expert who can create social media content, market the product or service on social media and build a healthy relationship with the new customers & existing customers to generate High ROI. Depending on your level of knowledge in social media marketing, social media marketers salary may range from Rs. 1,50,000 to 3,50,000.

PPC Specialist/Manager

Another career opportunity that you will get in the field of digital marketing is to work as a PPC Specialist/Manager where you will be responsible for improving visibility, identifying new leads, bringing more traffic and increasing your conversions. With the high career growth in the field of PPC advertising, you can easily earn an average of Rs. 4,86,104 Per year.

Content Marketing Manager/Content Marketing Specialist

Another career opportunity in the digital marketing domain is to work as a Content Marketing Manager, where you will be responsible for managing the company blog, social media content, guest blogging, video content, email communications & Public relations etc. Besides this you will also be responsible for the process of editing, proofreading and publishing the content on various platforms. Conclusion As the Digital Marketing domain is one of the booming industry in the upcoming years, it would be a magnificent condition for you to choose a career in the field of Digital Marketing not only because you can do a better job in a well-reputed company but you can also start with your own freelancing work, work from home, become webpreneurs and so on.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
